ReturnPolicy.Description:
Please note, until the item is faulty, we're not able to refund postage costs.
When the item you receive arrives in different condition than decribed because of my fault, I'm happy to offer full refund.

Title: Casual wedding bridal party floral pendant necklace silk flowers jewellery
Description: Welcome to Exclusive collection - bridal/wedding/prom/party or casual wear floral pendant. Artificial silk flowers, burgundy red hydrangea, purple wild berry and pink waxflower with a touch of greenery on silver metal base. H10cm W9cm Delicate flowers arranged with love to make you feel special! Created and designed with great care to the detail. Please note: cord/string is not included. Diameter of the bras round ring 4mm to put a cord string through. Every floral pendant comes with a box. See the last photo. Please note, the box you'll receive may be different shape but will be decorated with the same great care to suit best standards. Collecion: Rustic vintage. Made to impress. Made with love. There's one special thing about artificial wedding bouquets I make: each and every bouquet is unique. One of a kind. So your Big Day is going to have its own, exceptional wedding flower arrangements. That's my guarantee. I'm happy to create any matching decorations. This beautiful piece has been created by the professional florist with many years of experience in the floristry. Every single arrangement is designed and made with passion and love at the very high standards and care for details. We use the best quality realistic artificial silk flowers and accessories for exceptional results. Facaldo Flowers – bespoke flower arrangements There is a lot to come so please come back to see the latest updates! If you are in need of an arrangement made to order – please feel free to ask, we will be more than happy with your custom We specialize in wedding decorations: wedding bouquets, bride and bridesmaids bouquets, buttonholes, church and hall decorations designed with passion and enthusiastic approach made out of fresh cut flowers
